name: Sweet Cookie Tapper
description:
Mmmmm, cookies. Can we ever get enough of this tasty treat? Dive into the sweet world of cookies as you attempt to bake an endless supply of cookies. Simply tap on the giant cookie and start your cookie clicking adventure!

Features:

★ 24 delicious cookies to unlock
★ Dozens of sweet upgrades
★ Special structures with powerful abilities
★ Tons of hidden achievements to uncover
★ Magic cookies to boost your cookie production
★ Four different cookie themes
★ Compete with cookie collectors from all over the world
